name: 楊凱翔
objective: 本科目所探討的內容包括: 1. 集合與命題, 2. 計數、排列與組合, 3. 關聯與函式, 4. 基礎圖論,  5.樹狀結構, 6. 有限狀態機, 7. 演算法分析介紹, 8.生程函數, 9. 遞迴式10.群, 11. 布林幾何。
schedule:
Week	Topic	Chapter
1	Syllabus & Introduction
2	Formal Logic	Ch1.1-1.2
3	Formal Logic	Ch1.3-1.4
4	Formal Logic	Ch1.5-1.6
5	---國慶日---
6	Functions & Recursion	Ch2.1-2.3
7	Functions & Recursion	Ch2.4-2.6
8	Sets, Combinatorics	Ch3.1-3.2
9	期中考週Mid-term Exam
10	Sets, Combinatorics	Ch3.3-3.5
11	Sets, Combinatorics	Ch3.5-3.7
12	Relations, Functions	Ch4.1-4.3
13	Relations, Functions	Ch4.4-4.6
14	Graphs and Trees	Ch5.1-5.2
15	Graphs and Trees	Ch5.3-5.4
16	Graph Algorithms	Ch6.1-6.3
17	Graph Algorithms	Ch6.4-6.5
18	期末考Final Exam
scorePolicy:
項目	百分比
期中考	30%
期末考	40%
個人作業	20%
出席狀況	10%
materials:
1. K. H. Rosen, ”Discrete Mathematics and Its Applications”, sixth edition.
2. D.S. Malik and M.K. Sen, “Discrete Mathematical Structures: Theory and Applications”, Thomson.
